tags.name: kite-chat
tags.description: KiteChat is an embeddable livechat component

slots.description: kite-chat component contains chat messages as nested subcomponents, allowing server-side rendering

cssProperties.name: --kite-primary-color
cssProperties.description: accent color, styles toggle button, title bar, text selection, cursor

tags.name: kite-msg
tags.description:
Styled chat message component. Presence of the 
status
attribute means outgoing message.

attributes.name: messageId
attributes.description: Message id, optional, autogenerated with nanoid if not provided

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Status of the outgoing message; Optional, if present, must be one of 'sent' | 'delivered' | 'read';
in this case message is formatted as an outgoing message

attributes.name: timestamp
attributes.description: Timestamp as an ISO formatted string; optional, defaults to current time

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Message id, optional, autogenerated with nanoid if not provided

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Status of the outgoing message; Optional, if present, must be one of 'sent' | 'delivered' | 'read';
in this case message is formatted as an outgoing message

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: Timestamp as an ISO formatted string; optional, defaults to current time

slots.description: kite-msg component contains message text (possibly formatted)

tags.name: kite-file
tags.description: File component allows previewing and saving file message.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: file, sent from the chat or received by the chat

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: file, sent from the chat or received by the chat

properties.name: name
properties.description: file, sent from the chat or received by the chat

properties.name: file
properties.description: file, sent from the chat or received by the chat
